flawed_nl_solution:
At first Jeff paid, $300/month x 12 months = $<<300*12=3600>>3600/year
He paid $3600/year x 3 years = $10800 the firsts 3 years.
The final 2 years he paid $350/month x 12 months = $<<350*12=420>>420/year
He paid $420/year x 2 years = $<<420*2=840>>840 the last 2 years.
He paid the owner $10800 + $840 = $<<10800+840=11640>>11640 in total.
#### 11640

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4200, not 420. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
